quiz.a: In an L-shape: two squares in one direction and one perpendicular; may jump pieces.
A king/rook move for safety: king two squares toward rook; rook to the square the king passed over (no checks/pieces between/previous moves).

modules.title: Core Tactics
modules.instructions: Define fork, pin, skewer, discovered attack, and double check. Upload a diagram or brief example of any two.

modules.title: Openings & Endgames
modules.prompt: Describe one opening principle (control center, develop pieces, king safety) and one basic endgame idea (opposition, triangulation, promotion).

modules.title: Play Complete Games
modules.instructions: Play three full games (OTB or online). Upload PGNs or brief move lists and a 3–5 sentence takeaway for each game.

modules.title: Teach Someone
modules.instructions: Teach the rules to a beginner or run a mini-lesson for peers (15–20 min). Upload an outline and a photo or short reflection of how it went.
